config-form.no-permission-notification: Please note: You do not have the permission to edit the config!

proxy-settings.name: Proxy Settings
proxy-settings.add-proxy-exclude-error: The proxy exclude you want to add is not valid
proxy-settings.add-proxy-exclude-textfield: Add proxy exclude you want to add to proxy excludes here

admin-settings.name: Administration Settings
admin-settings.add-group-error: The group name you want to add is not valid
admin-settings.add-group-textfield: Add group you want to add to admin groups here
admin-settings.add-user-error: The user name you want to add is not valid
admin-settings.add-user-textfield: Add user you want to add to admin users here

validation.date-format-invalid: The date format is not valid
validation.plugin-url-invalid: This is not a valid url

help.dateFormatHelpText: Moments date format. Please have a look at the MomentJS documentation.
help.pluginRepositoryHelpText: The url of the plugin repository. Explanation of the placeholders: version = SCM-Manager Version; os = Operation System; arch = Architecture
help.enableRepositoryArchiveHelpText: Enable repository archives. A complete page reload is required after a change of this value.
help.disableGroupingGridHelpText: Disable repository Groups. A complete page reload is required after a change of this value.
help.allowAnonymousAccessHelpText: Anonymous users have read access on public repositories.
help.skipFailedAuthenticatorsHelpText: Do not stop the authentication chain, if an authenticator finds the user but fails to authenticate the user.
help.adminGroupsHelpText: Names of groups with admin permissions.
help.adminUsersHelpText: Names of users with admin permissions.
help.forceBaseUrlHelpText: Redirects to the base url if the request comes from a other url.
help.baseUrlHelpText: The url of the application (with context path), i.e. http://localhost:8080/scm
help.loginAttemptLimitHelpText: Maximum allowed login attempts. Use -1 to disable the login attempt limit.
help.loginAttemptLimitTimeoutHelpText: Timeout in seconds for users which are temporary disabled, because of too many failed login attempts.
help.proxyPasswordHelpText: The password for the proxy server authentication.
help.proxyUserHelpText: The username for the proxy server authentication.
help.proxyExcludesHelpText: Glob patterns for hostnames, which should be excluded from proxy settings.
help.enableXsrfProtectionHelpText: Enable XSRF Cookie Protection. Note: This feature is still experimental.
